name: Brotherhood Way Preschool
description: For children of all faiths and backgrounds. Play-based preschool and transitional kindergarten (TK) programs, with Jewish values and lens, features bright, spacious classrooms, 4,300 square feet of dedicated outdoor play areas, a garden space and an art studio.
fullDescription: For children of all faiths and backgrounds. Play-based preschool and transitional kindergarten (TK) programs, with Jewish values and lens, features bright, spacious classrooms, 4,300 square feet of dedicated outdoor play areas, a garden space and an art studio.
whatTheyOffer: For children of all faiths and backgrounds. Play-based preschool and transitional kindergarten (TK) programs, with Jewish values and lens, features bright, spacious classrooms, 4,300 square feet of dedicated outdoor play areas, a garden space and an art studio.
howToGetIt: Sign up to take a tour and submit an application on their website.
cost: This is a fee based service.
agency: Jewish Community Center of San Francisco
